result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for integrating with the Coinbase API, handling client interactions and data models for onramp token requests and responses.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating API client functionality and data models within separate files for better organization and maintainability.

internal/infras/coinbase/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with the Coinbase API, including JWT generation and path retrieval.

internal/infras/coinbase/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling onramp token requests and responses in the Coinbase integration.
